attributes.action: Seriously look into the permanent relocation of the house of commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present the architechs for the House of Commons say they will have to close down the house for major repair work to its roof ,this could take upto 25years if work  was to be done during recesses or 3years if completely closed, we believe that the time has come to seriously look into the possisbility of a new build with far less mp's and the house be turned into a museum generating  income rather than expenditure ,the new building will last therefore another 3-400years

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
